features: 5-ounce tube of Aveeno Positively Radiant Skin Brightening & Exfoliating Daily Face Scrub cleanses & buffs away dead skin, surface impurities, & oil for softer, brighter skin. This scrub helps improve skin's tone & texture & reveals radiant-looking skin

The unique formula of this brightening facial exfoliant scrub contains moisture-rich soy extract & naturally derived granules designed to gently exfoliate & cleanse, while removing dirt, oil, & bacteria
Gentle enough for everyday use & sensitive skin, the daily exfoliating face wash reveals your skin's youthful texture & glow while helping even tone

From a dermatologist recommended brand, this scrub is soap-free, oil-free, paraben-free, phthalate-free, sulfate-free, dye-free & hypoallergenic. Suitable for everyday use in a beauty or skincare routine, & is non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores

The Aveeno Positively Radiant collection is designed to enhance your natural radiance & give you a lit-from-within glow. With Soy extract, this product targets skin tone & texture to reveal radiant-looking, smooth, youthful, & healthy-looking skin
body.description: Gently buff away surface impurities, dead skin & oil for softer, brighter, more even-toned skin with Aveeno Positively Radiant Skin Brightening & Exfoliating Daily Face Scrub. It gently exfoliates skin & helps improve skin's tone & texture & reveals radiant-looking skin. This scrub leaves skin looking smooth & feeling refreshed & makes skin feel silky after 1 day. The soap-free & oil-free formula combines moisture-rich soy extract with naturally derived granules to exfoliate & cleanse away dirt, oil, & bacteria. This cleanser is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic & gentle enough for sensitive skin & everyday use in a regular beauty or skincare routine. From a dermatologist recommended skin care brand, the Positively Radiant collection is designed to help improve skin tone & texture & reveal radiant-looking skin to give you a lit-from-within glow. With soy extract, it targets skin tone & texture. To use, moisten face & gently massage scrub in circular motion. Rinse thoroughly & pat dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love!
reviews.reviewText: You can never go wrong with Aveeno! So gentle on your skin and yet exfoliates so well. Removes whatever is left on my skin after using makeup removing wipes. My most favorite aveeno product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The name of this product says it all!I used this Aveeno product and it was just really wonderful! My face was so smooth and looked polished. This product will be a staple in my skin care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works so well and deep cleans. I cannot use this daily but I have very sensitive skin. Plus I don't need to exfoliate everyday but I still love to use this once a week and a clay mask once a week to keep my skin fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves skin feeling super soft !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Hey guys!! First of all ignore me trying to record this video with one hand while struggling opening the tube with the other BUT😂 this product is absolutely amazing. If you’re looking for a gentle exfoliator, for those who don’t know what that is it’s a product that can come both chemical and physical forms to get rid of the dead skin cells. This product would be physical exfoliator since its a scrub and youre scrubbing off the dead skin cells yourself instead of having the chemical exfoliants do all the work. However. As i was saying!! This product not only works as a exfoliant but it feels like a dream on your skin its super super soft and melts into a facewash its not harsh whatsoever and gives you a soft skin feel. I 100/10 recommend this for beginners or for anyone who prefers a physical exfoliant. Dont forget your moisturizer to lock your moisture back in after exfoliating!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new exfoliating product and this is wonderful! Love the gentle, tiny beads, fresh scent and the way it makes my face feel after washing. I will definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so great on my face
reviews.reviewText: Make my face feel so smooth and looking beautiful...I try so many face cream and nothing works . Aveeno work well on my face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bad changes, in my opinion! UPDATE!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this face scrub for years. A while back, I ordered 4 at the end of BBB and while the photo at the time had the green top, when they came, they had the new black top. I just opened one up, used it and wow, has it changed!It stinks!!!! I can't wait to get it off my face and also the smell lingers afterwards for a while. The color is different, more clear compared to ivory. To me, it has more exfoliating particles in it as well.I'm sure I didn't get a bad batch, but in looking at reviews here, it doesn't seem like others are saying the same thing with any regularity. Perhaps the changes don't bother them.It is disappointing when any manufacturer changes a product that is working well. Of course, it's to save money - let's face it! Perhaps the fragrance they used was too costly.I have 4! So, I'm hoping to get used to it. I also will have to decide what to switch too, which is disappointing! I liked this product before the changes!Update - also, they changed the packaging and it’s so hard to squeeze the product out, especially when you get towards the end! It’s a thicker material, I assume with a smaller hole, and forget getting the last quarter out without great effort!
Aveeno is very gentle on the skin product. I recommend it to anyoneconcerned about harshness.
Muy buen producto. Ayuda a que la piel se mantenga limpia y sana.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un scrub facial muy suave y efectivo
reviews.reviewText: El producto viene respaldado por la marca Aveeno y la verdad es que a mi piel le ha sentado muy bien, incluso lo he utilizado en el cuerpo (brazos) y funciona genial. Es suave, con aroma agradable y lo mejor es que realmente sientes que retira la suciedad y grasa de la cara sin resecar. Hay que complementarlo con un hidratante facial después de ocuparlo. Además, es muy rendidor porque no necesitas mucho producto en cada ocasión.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased to find a facial scrub that is gentle enough for my skin.
Product is very good made my skin even betterGot delivery on time thanks amazon for wonderful product
